description:
Enter your Upi And Click Submit.
 Redirect to App
 Link Your Bank Account
 Send Any Amount to Any Other UPI
 Done! You will get Rs.10 Instant.

Don't try without 
admin permission

You will redirected to flipkart App
Then Select Product which one product you want to buy of any amount
Place order
Afer Product delivered and Return Period overed Then you will recive Payment
